name: Labyrinth City
description:
Labyrinth City: Pierre the Maze Detective is an adventure puzzle game for children and adults alike! Adapted from the award-winning children's illustration book series by IC4DESIGN and developed by Darjeeling, Labyrinth City takes you on a trip through a fantastic world of underground cities, hot-air balloons, tree-tops and haunted houses. Find your way through each interactive maze, engage with colorful characters, explore hidden pathways, unlock pieces of clues and solve the mystery along the way.

【The Story】
A new case has arrived for Pierre the Maze Detective! Mr. X has stolen the Maze Stone, which has the power to turn the whole Opera City into a maze. Help Pierre and his friend Carmen find their way through the mazes and stop Mr. X before it's too late!

【The Game】
You play as Pierre, Opera City's renowned maze detective, and you must retrieve the Maze Stone stolen by the notorious thief Mr. X! Without you, Opera City is doomed, as the Maze Stone has the power to turn everything around it into an intricate labyrinth. "Beautiful and cute puzzle games are fine and all," I hear you say, "but what about the challenge?". A fine question! In a maze, although there is only one true path to the exit, there are countless trails to hidden treasures and mini-games. So pay close attention while exploring Opera City and you will be pleasantly surprised.

【Features】
- Explore Opera City!
Enter colorful worlds teeming with life and intricate details based on the best-selling children’s book series Pierre the Maze Detective by IC4DESIGN

- Solve All Mysteries!
More than 100 hidden objects and unique trophies to find, engaging puzzles and minigames to stimulate your brain

- Interact With the Surroundings!
Over 500 interactions possible with the characters, items, and background

- Relive Childhood Memories!
Each scene is based on a double-page illustration from the original work

- Original soundtrack

- Save the World!
All levels are tied together by an overarching narration that will fill the detectives within us with purpose

- Speaks Your Language!
Available in English, Chinese (simplified and traditional), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, and Russian
